definition: to respond instantly/to act at once on hearing the news
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: The manager's arrival galvanized the workers into activity.
sentences.chinese: 經理一來，工人聞風而動。

sentences.english: The book was quickly brandished by the left as vindication of social democracy.
sentences.chinese: 左翼分子聞風而動，攻擊該書宣揚社會民主主義。
